description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
Bugs
NETWORKNET-33492 - IPM.Sharing message loaded in MailMessage and converted to MapiMessage changes to IPM.Note
NETWORKNET-33515 - MailMessage.Load causes System.FormatException while loading attached EML
NETWORKNET-33517 - MailMessage.Load causes System.IndexOutOfRangeException while loading attached EML
NETWORKNET-33519 - FROM field is NULL when EML loaded into MailMessage
NETWORKNET-33520 - "Invalid character in Mail Header" exception raised when EML loaded and saved back again as EML using MailMessage class
NETWORKNET-33521 - Hebrew characters converted to non-hebrew characters and inline image missing while using Aspose.Email.Printing to TIFF
NETWORKNET-33524 - Dot "." in the address causing System.Format Exception
NETWORKNET-33527 - Error in MailMessage unicode subject
NETWORKNET-33528 - PDF attachments in EML are changed to Base64 text files - .NET
NETWORKNET-33530 - System.ArgumentException: 'windows-1252http-equivContent-Type' is not a supported encoding name.
NETWORKNET-33531 - Wrong date shown when EML loaded in MailMessage
NETWORKNET-33534 - PST created from OST cannot be opened in Outlook
NETWORKNET-33535 - Regression issue - Conversion from EML to PDF
NETWORKNET-33536 - System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object
NETWORKNET-33537 - "Index out of range. This is a single-block configuration." Exception raised when messages copied from a PST to a new PST
NETWORKNET-33542 - EML to MHTML - Problem wiht Subject having UTF-8 Encoded
NETWORKNET-33543 - Attachments not detected in EML
NETWORKNET-33544 - System.ArgumentException: 'iso-2022-jp-2' is not a supported encoding name
NETWORKNET-33545 - EML to MHTML - Problem with Email Body
NETWORKNET-33546 - Appointment.RequestAppointment() gives "Object Reference not set to an instance of Object" Exception
NETWORKNET-33575 - From field is sometimes null
NETWORKNET-33577 - Problem with Saving as EML
NETWORKNET-33594 - EML recipients truncated when added to Personal Storage (Aspose.Email for .NET)
NETWORKNET-33595 - Garbage characters shown for EML MessageInfo.DisplayTo field (Aspose.Email for .NET)
NETWORKNET-33576 - MSG to EML Conversion - Problem with Text Body in Notepad
NETWORKNET-33495 - SmtpClient and PostFix 2.8's Pre-greet
 
Enhancement/ New Features
NETWORKNET-33385 - Writing an item from PST to the stream
NETWORKNET-33523 - EWS - Retrieve ACL/ExchangeFolderPermissions information for existing folders
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
